Traits.Name: Overdrive 5
Traits.Description: Deals boosted damage if the current round is 5 or higher.

Traits.Name: Slow
Traits.Description: Go after all other characters. If multiple characters take slow turns, it takes the same order as regular turns (ally/enemy/ally).

Traits.Name: Aetherwall
Traits.Description: Cover from ranged attacks further away than range 2.

Traits.Name: Resonance
Traits.Description: Attacks deal boosted damage if they hit 3 or more foes.

Traits.Name: Unstable Reality
Traits.Description: 1/any turn. After being damaged by an attack or effect, teleport 1 in any direction.

Traits.Name: Power Overwhelming
Traits.Description: If overdrive has triggered, gain flying and vigor 1.

Actions.Name: Annihilate
Actions.Hit: Deal heavy magic damage and inflict blight.
Actions.Blightboost: Increase to blast 2. After attack resolves, summon a height 1 space of terrain in the area.
